entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
